name: Brian Lara International Cricket 2007
description:
Brian Lara International Cricket 2007 is a sports game developed by Codemasters and Swordfish Studios. It was originally released in 2007. It was published by Codemasters. On review aggregator Metacritic, Brian Lara International Cricket 2007 has a score of 71.
You can play Brian Lara International Cricket 2007 on PC and PlayStation 2.
